content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 243.1 - Applicability

State Regulations
(a) Part 243
establishes the CSAPR NO
x

Ozone Season Group 2 Trading

Program allocation process as applicable to units in New York State with regard
to the control periods of 2021 and subsequent years. Applicability for this
program is defined in 40 CFR
97.804
(see Table 1, section
200.9
of this

Title). Notes

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
